root.name: Lips: Number One Hits
root.description: Songs"Viva la Vida" - Coldplay"Don't Matter" - Akon"The Tide is High (Get the Feeling)" - Atomic Kitten"Loser" - Beck"Don't Phunk With My Heart" - Black Eyed Peas"Heart of Glass" - Blondie"Big Girls Don't Cry" - Fergie"Broken Strings" - James Morrison feat. Nelly Furtado"She Drives Me Crazy" - Fine Young Cannibals"Around The Way Girl" - LL Cool J"How You Remind Me" - Nickelback"Love Generation" - Bob Sinclar"Don't Worry Be Happy" - Bobby McFerrin"Bubbly" - Colbie Caillat"(I Just) Died In Your Arms" - Cutting Crew"Disturbia" - Rihanna"U Can't Touch This" - MC Hammer"More Than Words" - Extreme"Apologize" - OneRepublic feat. Timbaland"Karma Chameleon" - Culture Club"I Heard It Through the Grapevine" - Marvin Gaye"Oh, Pretty Woman" - Roy Orbison"Ready, Set, Go!" - Tokio Hotel"The Look" - Roxette"Millennium" - Robbie Williams"California Love" - 2Pac feat. Dr. Dre and Roger Troutman"Barbie Girl" - Aqua"Just Dance" - Lady Gaga feat. Colby O'Donis"Everybody Wants to Rule the World" - Tears for Fears"The Fear" - Lily Allen"Hey Baby" - DJ Otzi"I Don't Feel Like Dancin'" - Scissor Sisters"Heartless" - Kanye West"Touch My Body" - Mariah Carey"Hey There Delilah" - The Plain White T's"Always On My Mind" - Pet Shop Boys"I'm Yours" - Jason Mraz"I Get Around" - The Beach Boys"Lovefool" - The Cardigans"Push the Button" - Sugababes Downloadable Packs A code included with the game allows users to download any one of the following downloadable packs:Lips House Party LL Cool J - Going Back To Cali Bobby Brown - My Prerogative Janet Jackson - Nasty Montell Jordan - This Is How We Do It Paula Abdul - Straight Up Lips Turn It Up To 11 Tour 30 Seconds to Mars - From Yesterday Coldplay - Lost! Nickelback - Photograph Hoobastank - The Reason My Chemical Romance - Welcome To The Black Parade Lips Hearts Heartbreak Tour James Blunt - 1973 Daniel Powter - Bad Day Robbie Williams - Eternity Daniel Bedingfield - If You're Not The One Jewel - You Were Meant For Me
